title: FAQ Accordion Component
description:
Create Accessible FAQ Accordion Component

Build a fully accessible accordion component for the FAQ section that displays 5-8 frequently asked questions covering pricing, timelines, process, and services with proper keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

Requirements:
- Create accordion structure with expand/collapse functionality for each FAQ item
- Implement proper ARIA attributes (aria-expanded, aria-controls, aria-labelledby, role="region")
- Support full keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys for moving between items)
- Ensure only one or multiple panels can be open simultaneously (decide on behavior)
- Write 5-8 FAQ entries covering: pricing structure, project timelines, service offerings, and process workflow
- Include visual indicators for expanded/collapsed states (icons, animations)
- Maintain focus management when expanding/collapsing items
- Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver) to verify announcements
- Ensure sufficient color contrast and touch target sizes for accessibility
- Add smooth transitions for expand/collapse animations
- Make responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
- Consider initial state (all collapsed vs first item expanded)
